document.full_text: the woman who found the body of a young boy left by a roadside in maine is expected to help officiate at his funeral this weekend, the funeral home said on wednesday.
document.title: woman who found boy's body expected to officiate at funeral
lines_and_colors: the woman who found the body of a young boy left by a roadside in maine is expected to help officiate at his funeral this weekend, the funeral home said on wednesday.
